climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: Cool & Breathable: Made of rayon derived from bamboo, this temperature-regulating pillowcase set is cooler to the touch and more moisture-wicking than cotton. Ideal for hot sleepers and those looking for a cozy, dry night's sleep without overheating.

Silk Soft: The premium fabric is silky and light, with a twill weave for extra softness and smoothness.This soft pillowcase set lessens tension on your hair and skin. Enjoy a gentle sleep experience that reduces wrinkles and hair loss for a truly rejuvenating night's rest.
Giftable: Featuring a silky hand feel in elegant natural hues, this pillowcase set will elevate the style of your entire room, and is the perfect gift for your loved ones or just to show you care.
Thoughtful Details: Envelope closure prevents hair entanglement or the pillow from sliding out. The pillow insert can be tucked in for a neater look, or left loose for a more casual look.

Easy Care: This Standard 100 by OEKO-TEX certified pillowcase set is machine washable for easy maintenance. Machine wash on cold with like colors. Use only non-chlorine bleach if necessary, tumble dry low and cool iron if needed. Please take the product out of the dryer immediately after drying to reduce wrinkles.

What You Can Get: This standard size pillowcase set includes 2 pillowcases (20" x 26"). Rayon derived from bamboo may naturally and expectedly shrink after washes. We've increased the size to compensate for the natural shrinkage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought these as extra pillow cases to already purchased sheet set about 3 years ago. Great quality sheets, soft and great for hot sleepers. Wash well and have held up really well, no color fading at all. Teal color is very rich and vibrant looking.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Dreamy Upgrade for Comfort and Style!
reviews.reviewText: The Bedsure Cooling Pillow Cases Queen have turned my sleeping experience into a true luxury, and I'm thrilled to give them a well-deserved 5-star review! These pillowcases have exceeded my expectations in terms of softness, appearance, and overall quality.First and foremost, the softness of these pillowcases is simply heavenly. The moment I lay my head down, I'm met with a gentle, plush texture that adds an extra layer of comfort to my sleep routine. The fabric feels delicate against my skin and ensures that I drift off into dreamland with ease.But these pillowcases don't just feel good – they look great too. The design is elegant and timeless, adding a touch of sophistication to my bedding ensemble. Whether my bed is neatly made or in a more relaxed state, these pillowcases always manage to elevate the overall aesthetics of my bedroom.One of the standout features of these pillowcases is their wrinkle-free quality. No more fussing over creases or worrying about a less-than-pristine appearance. They maintain their smoothness even after a night of restful sleep, leaving my bed looking effortlessly put together.Additionally, the cooling factor is a game-changer. These pillowcases truly live up to their name by helping to regulate my body temperature as I sleep. It's a subtle yet impactful touch that ensures I stay comfortable throughout the night, without any overheating.In terms of durability, these pillowcases have held up impressively well. Despite regular use and washing, they've maintained their softness, appearance, and overall quality. It's clear that Bedsure prioritizes both comfort and longevity in their products.In conclusion, the Bedsure Cooling Pillow Cases Queen are an absolute must-have for anyone seeking an upgrade in both comfort and style. With their exceptional softness, elegant design, and wrinkle-free nature, they've become a cherished part of my bedding collection. If you're looking to transform your sleeping experience into something truly indulgent, I wholeheartedly recommend giving these pillowcases a try. It's a decision that will have you looking forward to bedtime every night!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Stays Cool. Great Color.
reviews.reviewText: These pillow cases feel really great against your skin. They seems nice and good quality. The only reason I didn’t give them five stars is because they wrinkle easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome pillow covers
reviews.reviewText: I bought about 10 packages of 2 by now! I love these pillowcases. I use them during my Reiki treatments. They feel super soft and cool to the touch. I use these a lot and they hold their color pretty well too. I can only recommend them! I also bought a dark blue color one for my son at home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: ok, these are fabulous. I got them on a lighting sale. I have an extra long king pillow, hard to find pillow cases. didn't want a cheap poly, love linen but wanted white, not a fan of white linen. Everyone is into satin pillowcases cuz they're "good" for your face... no, they're not and not a natural product. THESE are rayon, a soft silky feel. Keep their shape well, sewn great! and had the pocket fold on the inside to keep the pillow locked in. I LOVE these. Going to look for more of their products and colors ❤️p.s. REALLY well packaged, high end.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Really great till you wash them
reviews.reviewText: I loved these pillowcase. It was shiny like satin and kept cool overnight. I bought a second one after a few days. But then I washed them (gentle cycle in Woolite) and they lost their luster. They lost their smoothness. Now they’re more “microfiber-feeling” but not satiny smooth, and the color turned dull matte. They’re still functional but I bought them for their cooling feature and the satiny feel & color. Just buyer beware here. They didn’t fall apart or anything but I don’t use them for myself anymore. I put them on my husband’s side of the bed:-)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love these because they are so cooling but not wrinkle free. However once you get them on a pillow you can smooth out most of the wrinkles or you can quickly run an iron over them. Because they are so smooth and cooling I can overlook a few wrinkles if I do not feel like ironing them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: If you're like me and keep waking up at night to flip the pillow, this is definitely the pillowcase for you. I really like it and I like that you can get it in different sizes as well. It's soft, almost decadent, it's so silky. It not only cools your skin, but silk or silk-like material is good for your facial skin as well because it is so smooth. I bought a few pairs to give as gifts and they were much appreciated.
I love those pillow cases! They have a beautiful color, are very soft and stay cold. I took the wrong size, so check your pillows and sizes before purchasing!
Keeps your head from sweating, feels silky on your face

I have always had super soft sheets and I left my pillow case in a hotel by accident. I used a regular pillow case from IKEA and I felt the difference the very first night I slept. It really makes a difference in the quality of my sleep.
These pillow cases are great to use. My only complaint is they wrinkle super easy which is a very small complaint. They are soft and comfortable, easy to clean on a delicate cycle.
Quality is good, the fit well
